elvs_50s_updo.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_50s_updo.description: Request A 1950s stylized updo for makehuman female models. Tri mesh but loads in mh the same. One texture included.

elvs_adrienne_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_adrienne_hair.description: A hairstyle for makehuman female models in a long side part styling. Tri mesh but loads in MH the same. One simple texture included.

elvs_ashley_may_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_ashley_may_hair.description: A short feathered hairdo for makehuman female models. Tri mesh but loads in MH the same. One simple texture included.

elvs_braid_bun.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_braid_bun.description: A braided bun updo for female makehuman models. Optional beads available in clothes accessories. One texture setup included. Quad mesh-but this one was sculpted so a lil high in poly.

elvs_braided_rows.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_braided_rows.description: A hair for makehuman female models consisting of a row of braids with beaded ends. One simple texture set up included. Feel free to set it up for best display in whatever way pleases you-works well for toon setups also. Quad based model. Used hair helper to create may want to set up differently as hair does not work perfectly on all genders/headshapes out of the box.

elvs_daisy_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_daisy_hair.description: A long straight hairdo for makehuman female models. Tri mesh but loads in mh the same. One simple texture included.

elvs_grump_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_grump_hair.description: A hair for makehuman male models. Quad model one simple texture setup included. Made for custom model Ronald Grump but works with most males.

elvs_hazel_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_hazel_hair.description: A hair for makehuman female models in a long straight carefree style. Tri mesh. One texture setup included.

elvs_inverted_curly_bob.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_inverted_curly_bob.description: Request.- A hair for makehuman female models consisting of an asymmetrical Inverted curly style. This was made to fill a requested style for of our members character model but it can look nice on all female models. Quad mesh one texture setup included.

elvs_island_princess_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_island_princess_hair.description: A long hair for makehuman female models in an island inspired fashion. Quad model and one simple texture included. Lower poly without the flower.

elvs_katherine_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_katherine_hair.description: A short ish straight asymmetrical hair for makehuman female models. Tri mesh but loads in MH the same. One simple texture included.

elvs_keylth_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_keylth_hair.description: A long half updo hair for makehuman males but will work for ladies also. Quad model. One texture setup included.

elvs_lady_hippy_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_lady_hippy_hair.description: A long straight hair for makehuman female models in a casual hippy updo. Quad model and one simple texture included.

elvs_lara_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_lara_hair.description: Request Lara Croft Tomb raider 2001 movie edition costume pieces. A hair for makehuman female models consisting of a braided long hairstyle. Quad mesh. One texture setup included. This version of braid is straight down the back.

elvs_maxwell_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_maxwell_hair.description: Request-Male hair for makehuman models. One simple texture included. Tri mesh but loads in makehuman the same.

elvs_micky_afro.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_micky_afro.description: A hair for makehuman female models in a mickey-stylized afro form. Tri mesh. One texture setup included.

elvs_short_daisy_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_short_daisy_hair.description: A short version of the Daisy hair for makehuman female models. Tri mesh but loads in mh the same. One simple texture included. Uses same texture as long version.

elvs_short_side_do.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_short_side_do.description: A short- side oriented style of hair for female makehuman models utilizing the toon texture setup.

elvs_that_80s_babe_hair.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_that_80s_babe_hair.description: A long tousled hair for makehuman male models but will work on ladies also. Tri mesh. One texture setup included.

elvs_wavy_bob.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_wavy_bob.description: Request A hairstyle for female makehuman models consisting of a curly/wavy toonish stylized bob. Tri mesh but loads the same. One simple black texture included. texture will work scaled down to 256 by 256 as this is what it was originally intended for .

elvs_witchy_lil_bob.author: Elvaerwyn
elvs_witchy_lil_bob.description: A hair for makehuman female models styled in a simple bob. This hair was made to go under the witchy hat but works just fine as a stand alone. One simple texture in strawberry blonde is included texture was fine tuned by punkduck for me to lighten my load ty punk. A black texture will follow later. Tri mesh but loads in mh the same lower poly than my usual builds and is highly transferable to quad for those who need that.
